artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige III; Publisher: Iseya Kisaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; busy port scene with small boats and open warehouses and other buildings; predomincatley black, blue and red; sheet affixed together
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Kaigan-dori in Yokohama
